style.css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("cookpad.com") {
  #ad_right_down_image-0,
  #ad_right_down_text-0,
  #sticky_reference_element,
  .clearfix.new_business_lead_on_footer,
  #footer_content_wrapper,
  .spotlight_panel,
  img[alt="Bn prorecipe top"],
  .wallpaper_ad_left_skyscraper,
  .wallpaper_ad_right_skyscraper,
  .wallpaper_ad_center,
  .social_buttons,
  #sns_button_on_new_header,
  #new_text_tieup_wrapper,
  #side
  {display: none !important;}
}
